function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Population density contributing to faster spread of the virus","Impact":"Higher transmission rate and increased risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Implementing strict containment measures and social distancing protocols","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for monitoring and enforcement","People":"Residents of high-density cities","Owner":"Local and national government authorities"},{"Description":"Underreporting of new cases of COVID-19","Impact":"Misrepresentation of the true extent of the outbreak and delayed response to control interventions","Mitigation":"Improving daily reporting practices and implementing consistent control interventions","Technologies":"Data analytics for accurate reporting and monitoring","People":"Health professionals, government agencies","Owner":"Health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of peer review for included studies in the systematic review","Impact":"Risk of drawing inaccurate conclusions and making flawed inferences","Mitigation":"Exercise caution when interpreting the findings and prioritize peer-reviewed studies","Technologies":"AI-powered literature review and analysis tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions and academic publishers"}]}
